H0.text: who sings so come and dance with me jai ho. A.R. Rahman

H1.text: who sings so come and dance with me jai ho. Sukhwinder Singh

H2.text: who sings so come and dance with me jai ho. Shreya Ghoshal

H3.text: who sings so come and dance with me jai ho. Tanvi Shah

A4.text: Sukhwinder Singh sang 'Jai Ho' in the film Slumdog Millionaire

A5.text: Sukhwinder Singh's song 'Jai Ho' won the Grammy Award for Best Song Written for a Motion Picture, Television or Other Visual Media in 2010
